item.title: Astera Labs’ stock is rocketing. Why analysts predict even more gains for the AI chip play.
item.description: Astera Labs’ connectivity products are resonating in the AI era, and analysts see potential for big upside next year as a new offering ramps up.

item.title: U.S. data is a bedrock of the American economy. Now it’s under attack.
item.description: Trump’s attack on the federal jobs statistics is the latest blow to essential U.S. infrastructure that has taken a century to build.

item.title: Kashkari leans toward rate cut as concerns about an economic slowdown grow at the Fed
item.description: There are growing worries at the central bank about an economic slowdown.

item.title: ‘I feel shaken’: A man offered $50 to powerwash my patio. He would not take ‘no’ for an answer.
item.description: I wasn’t interested. I told him, “No thanks.” That didn’t work.

item.title: Did baby boomers really have it easier than millennials?
item.description: Each generation tends to compare itself to the one that came before and after, and not always with the greatest accuracy.
